p.seg: good evening , ladies and gentlemen . welcome to our restaurant .
i 'd like to reserve a table for two at eight o 'clock , please .
we have a window table reserved for you .
will this table be all right ?
those who don 't want to swim can sit at the seashore and enjoy yourselves . you can watch the splendid sunset .
oh , by the way , can you tell me what i should do if the fec is left when i am about to leave .
i don 't like milk in my coffee .
don 't mention it , madam . we do apologize for the inconvenience .
